title: StudsonBudson
author: StudsonBudson
content: Looking for websites to move my referral program to, from bcgame. I have a very successful campaign on stake and bcgame with 6 figure earnings, but bcgame has nerfed my affiliate % from 35 to 9.8. If any website has a better affiliate program and can offer some sort of welcome bonus for my high roller referrals on sign up, please let me know. Would be highly appreciated.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: StudsonBudson on June 29, 2023, 03:58:30 AMLooking for websites to move my referral program to, from bcgame. I have a very successful campaign on stake and bcgame with 6 figure earnings, but bcgame has nerfed my affiliate % from 35 to 9.8. If any website has a better affiliate program and can offer some sort of welcome bonus for my high roller referrals on sign up, please let me know. Would be highly appreciated. You can try gamdom.com. Your referrals sign up under you and you earn usd based on their wagered amount. I'm not sure what the % is. Your people also get 15% rakeback to start for the 1st 7 days. I'm not sure if it all adds up to higher or lower than what you currently get, but can't hurt to get people playing under you on more sites.

Check out Wolf.Bet --> https://partners.wolf.bet/One of the best affiliate programs I have come across with them literally not charging any admin fee(s) and giving you revenue share deals (default is only 5% but that`s to avoid abuse, contact them for a better deal). They just don`t offer typical welcome bonuses. comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: StudsonBudson on June 29, 2023, 03:58:30 AMIf any website has a better affiliate program and can offer some sort of welcome bonus for my high roller referrals on sign up, please let me know. Would be highly appreciated. All the suggestions provided by other members are pretty good. Based on my personal experience, I've noticed that newer platforms tend to offer slightly better terms to their affiliates. They're trying to attract new players and build their name in the community, so they tend to be more generous. However, be cautious and ensure that the casino you choose is reputable. You'll often find that the most appealing affiliate terms come from shady platforms that may not have your best interests at heart. Just make sure to check out the terms and conditions of each platform and review the specific details of their affiliate programs.As for the welcome bonus for your referrals, I'm not sure if such a specific bonus exists. After all, how can the casino predict in advance that your referrals will be high rollers?

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on June 29, 2023, 07:19:33 AMQuote from: StudsonBudson on June 29, 2023, 03:58:30 AMLooking for websites to move my referral program to, from bcgame. I have a very successful campaign on stake and bcgame with 6 figure earnings, but bcgame has nerfed my affiliate % from 35 to 9.8. If any website has a better affiliate program and can offer some sort of welcome bonus for my high roller referrals on sign up, please let me know. Would be highly appreciated. If my understanding is correct FortuneJack has the highest referral commission which is 60% Then it is Stake that offers the second highest commission which is around 50%. Bitcasino is offering up to 45% as written on their affiliate page and the same is being offered by winz.io.For Fortune Jack, you can visit this page for more details: https://fortunejackpartners.com/For Bitcasino you can visit this link for more details: https://bitcasino.io/affiliate-program  For winz.io you can visit this link for more details: https://winz.team/The percentage figure shouldn’t be the top priority since each affiliate program has different approach on how they calculate affiliate earnings. Some casino get the affiliate commision on the total amount lose by other user and some casino like Stake counts the total wager for affiliate earnings including winning bets. So the affiliate structure should be considered to find a suitable replacement on what OP asking. I’m not familiar with BC.Game Affiliate structure but Stake and Bitcasino has a very good affiliate structure which I believe that can use by the OP to replace his old affiliate program since I'm sure that he can easily climb higher tier due to his strong affiliate network to get the maximum tier for the affiliate program.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Well, regarding my previous comment and others who suggested Coinslotty, I just read the unfortunate news from their representative. Unfortunately, they have decided not to proceed with the project, while Coinslotty brand may continue under different management. I'm not sure how this will affect their affiliate program.

Did you have some though contacting directly to the casino for created referral campaign only for your self (The reward could be different, not the same like referral program in the site). Most of private referral campaign with casino have more advantage than regular.If you can gain a big fish, I believe you have some place to be share for your link referral. IMO, if you have the media for sharing referral link it's better to tried private contact maybe you can get a chance getting a special campaign only for your self.

Bitcasino is offering up to 45% as written on their affiliate page and the same is being offered by winz.io.For Fortune Jack, you can visit this page for more details: https://fortunejackpartners.com/For Bitcasino you can visit this link for more details: https://bitcasino.io/affiliate-program  For winz.io you can visit this link for more details: https://winz.team/That is high affiliate commission if there is no surprise underlying that number. For example your referral must wager thousand dollars and crazy shit like that. Otherwise it become hard to invest time and energy on bringing the referrals and get nothing at the end. I have seen worst of the worst from brightest casino’s but fortunejack seems odd man out so may be OP can halt their search over there. By the way it is interesting to see OP is making six figures of income in the world of affiliate. How you doing it? Are you launching CPA campaigns on various micro tasking sites or some other ways to promote it?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: StudsonBudson on June 29, 2023, 03:58:30 AMbut bcgame has nerfed my affiliate % from 35 to 9.8. That's very unfair. You must had a mutual understanding with their affiliate manager and hopefully they did not drop it without giving you enough time.Problem with affiliate marketing is, you do everything to make them big but when they are big they kick you out without showing a minimum respect. If you are really too good to bring so many affiliates and helping them to make that much money, then why don't you consider having your own gambling site. Have your own business and bring the traffic by yourself.
